Today's existence is also thanks to The White
Dragon

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn:
It's unbearable that the demons are increasing
like this

MsgJp:
レスタニアの北部は、オーク以外にも
恐ろしく強力な魔物が多数いると聞く
MsgEn:
I hear that the northern part of Lestania is home
to a number of fearsome and powerful demons in
addition to orcs!

MsgJp:
そいつらからハイデルを守るのだからな――
グリッテン砦の任務は気が引き締まるよ
MsgEn:
We have to protect Ide from them-- The mission to
Fort Gritten is very important.

MsgJp:
装備と道具次第で、戦いは有利にも不利にもなるぞ
まぁ、今さらお前ほどの覚者に言うことでもないか
MsgEn:
Depending on the equipment and tools, the battle
can be either advantageous or disadvantageous.
Well, there's no need for me to tell you, an
Arisen, that now, is there?

MsgJp:
しかし、ここは少々臭いがな――
慣れてしまえば気にならないのかも知れんが
MsgEn:
However, there is a bit of a smell here. If you
get used to it, it might not bother you.

MsgJp:
神殿から届いた物資があるぞ
危険地帯へゆくなら、十分用意していけよ
MsgEn:
Here are some supplies from the Temple: If you're
going into the danger zone, be prepared!

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかが？
MsgEn: How are you?

MsgJp: 暮らしは厳しくなる一方だよ
MsgEn: Life is getting tougher

MsgJp: お仕事頑張って！
MsgEn: But good luck!

MsgJp:
あ、ああ――
レスタニアの覚者か――
MsgEn: Ah, Arisen―― Lestania's Arisen――

MsgJp:
ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ
周りに侵食魔がいないか確認したい――
MsgEn:
Wait a moment, I want to check if there are any
infected around.

MsgJp:
一人でいる時に魔物に襲われたら
俺なんてひとたまりもない――うう――
MsgEn:
If I were attacked by monsters when I'm alone,
I'd be completely helpless... Ohh...

MsgJp:
恐ろしいことばかりだ
どうしてこんなことに――
MsgEn: It's all so horrible. How did this happen--

MsgJp:
異国からの覚者――？
信じてもいいんだろうね？
MsgEn:
Arisen from a foreign country――? I suppose it's
okay to believe, right?

MsgJp:
へぇ――あんたのところは
白い竜が治めてるのかい
MsgEn: So... your place is ruled by a white dragon.

MsgJp:
いつになったら安心して
外を歩けるようになるんだろうね
MsgEn: I wonder when we'll be able to walk out in peace.

MsgJp:
実は、ここまで逃げてくる間に
家族とはぐれて――
無事でいるといいんだけど
MsgEn:
Actually, as I was running away, I got separated
from my family-- I hope they are safe and sound.

MsgJp:
い、異国の覚者様――？
な、何か、ご用でしょうか
MsgEn:
A, Arisen from a foreign land――? Umm, do you need
something?

MsgJp:
もう、逃げるのも疲れてしまいました
少し座って休みたい――
MsgEn:
I'm tired of running away. I need to sit down and
rest a bit--

MsgJp: 私がいた村は侵食に飲み込まれて――
MsgEn: The village I was in has been corrupted...

MsgJp: 今を耐え抜けば、幸せになれるのかしら――
MsgEn:
If I endure this moment, will I be able to become
happy?

MsgJp: 何だ、手短に頼む
MsgEn: So, what do you want?

MsgJp:
いつどこで侵食魔の
襲撃を受けるやらわからぬ
――気が抜けないというのも辛いな
MsgEn:
It's hard to know when and where the Corruption
will strike --and it's hard not to be distracted.

MsgJp: おい、警戒を怠らないでくれ
MsgEn: Hey, don't let your guard down.

MsgJp:
戦える者が戦わねばならん
こんなところで膝をつくわけには――
MsgEn:
Those who can fight must fight. We can't just
fall to our knees here—

MsgJp: お、あたしに何か用かい？
MsgEn: Oh, do you need something from me?

MsgJp:
ああ、助かったよ――
一人ではもたないと思ってたところだったんだ
MsgEn:
Oh, I'm saved! I thought I wouldn't make it on my
own.

MsgJp:
戦士が弱音吐くべきじゃないって
わかってるんだけどね――
辛い時は辛いよ
MsgEn:
I know that warriors shouldn't complain, but you
know... it's tough when it's tough.

MsgJp:
気が抜けると疲れちゃうからね
拠点に帰るまでは戦闘中だと思っておかないと
MsgEn:
Because if you let your guard down, you'll get
tired. Until you return to base, think of it as
being in combat.

MsgJp:
冒険のパートナーをお探しでしたら
いつでも私に声を掛けてくださいね
MsgEn:
If you're looking for an adventure partner, feel
free to call out to me anytime.

MsgJp:
お知り合いへの連絡や、ポーンの呼び出しは
私達、《冒険仲介係》にお申し付けください！
MsgEn:
If you need to contact someone you know or call a
pawn, please contact us and ask for our 《Adventure
Organizer》!

MsgJp: お仕事頑張ってくださいね！
MsgEn: Good luck with your work!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、何かご用ですか？
MsgEn: Arisen, what are you doing?

MsgJp:
さぁさ、ゆっくり見てってよ！
何はともあれ、武器がなくちゃ
戦いにならないからね
MsgEn:
Come on, take your time and have a look! After
all, without weapons, there's no fight!

MsgJp:
自分の職で扱える武器でないと
買っても使えないからね、気をつけな
MsgEn:
Be careful, even if you buy it, you can't use it
unless it's a weapon that your profession can
handle.

MsgJp: 何かお探しの武器でもあるのかい？
MsgEn: Are you looking for a weapon?

MsgJp:
いらっしゃい！
武器の品揃えなら、ウチが一番だよ
MsgEn:
Come on in!
We have the best selection of weapons!

MsgJp:
そうそう、新人覚者さんや騎士さん向けに
入門用の武器を用意してるよ！
MsgEn:
Yes, we have an introductory weapon for new
Arisen and knights!

MsgJp:
転職やポーンとの契約で必要になったら
とりあえずウチに顔だしな！
なにせ、武器がなきゃ始まらないからね
MsgEn:
When it comes to job changes or contracts with a
Pawn, make sure to turn to me first! After all,
without weapons, nothing can begin.

MsgJp:
さぁさ、じっくり見てってよ！
あの《滅びの渦》をどうにかしに行くんだろ？
だったらなおさら、慎重に武器を選ばないとね
MsgEn:
Now, take a good look! How are we going to deal
with that "Vortex of Ruin"? We better choose our
weapons carefully.

MsgJp:
あたしたちには詳しいことは知らされないけど
でも、大変だってことは嫌ってほどわかるよ
――応援してるからね！
MsgEn:
We're not told much, but we know it's tough ――
We're rooting for you!

MsgJp:
腕によりをかけて作った武器だよ
きっちり売ってやらないと
MsgEn:
This weapon was created with great skill. I won't
sell it unless I get a good price.

MsgJp:
ウチが店を開けなきゃ
新人覚者さんや騎士さんは
どこで武器を手に入れるっていうのさ！
MsgEn:
If we don't open the store, where are the new
Arisen and knights going to get their weapons?

MsgJp:
防具は種類により、装備できる部位が
決まっております
くれぐれもお買い間違えのないように
MsgEn:
The armor has different types, and the equipped
parts are predetermined. Please be careful not to
make any mistakes when making a purchase.

MsgJp:
生死の境は、防具の質で決まると言っても
過言ではありません、どうかご留意ください
MsgEn:
The boundary between life and death is said to be
determined by the quality of the armor, and this
is not an exaggeration. Please keep this in mind.

MsgJp:
うちは甥が騎士団に入ったばかりでしてね
嬉しいやら心配やら
おっと、無駄話でしたね
MsgEn:
My nephew just joined the knight's order, you
see. I have mixed feelings—happy and worried.
Oops, that was a bit of idle chatter.

MsgJp:
これはこれは覚者さま
防具の相談ならうちで承りますよ
MsgEn:
Well, well, well, Master Arisen. If you need
advice on armor, we're happy to consult with you.

MsgJp:
ああ、覚者さまでしたか
耳にタコかとは思いますが
防具のお買い間違えにはお気を付けください
MsgEn:
Ah, it's the Arisen, isn't it? I might be
repeating myself, but please be careful not to
make a mistake when buying armor.

MsgJp:
うちの甥も騎士団員なのですが
連絡がつかなくて――
いえ、きっと《滅びの渦》の件で
忙しいだけですよね
MsgEn:
My nephew is a member of the knight's order, but
I can't get in touch with him... Well, he's
probably just busy with the "Vortex of Ruin"
situation, right?

MsgJp:
防具屋としてあえて言いきらせていただきます
生死の境は、防具の質で決まるのです
どうか、どうかご留意を
MsgEn:
As an armorer, I dare to say the line between
life and death is determined by the quality of the
armor. Please, please, please keep in mind...

MsgJp:
レスタニアには白竜さまがいらっしゃいます
それに覚者さまも――
MsgEn:
There's the White Dragon in Lestania and the
Arisen—

MsgJp: あら覚者さま、ご機嫌いかがですか？
MsgEn: Master Arisen, how are you feeling today?

MsgJp: メイリーフにご用でしょうか？
MsgEn: Do you have some business with Mayleaf?

MsgJp: 任務の成功をお祈りしてますわ
MsgEn: I'm praying for the success of the mission.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、何かご用でしょうか？
MsgEn: Master Arisen, do you have any business with me?

MsgJp:
本当におつかれさまでした
また、うちに来てくださいね
MsgEn:
Thank you so much for your hard work. Please come
visit us again.

MsgJp:
あなたさえ良ければ住んでくれても
かまいませんよ
MsgEn: If you're okay with it, you can even live here.

MsgJp:
神殿に目玉が現れたと聞いてから
いつかこんなことが起こるのではないかと
怖れていましたよ
MsgEn:
Ever since I heard about the eyeballs appearing
in the temple, I've been afraid that one day
something like this would happen!

MsgJp: 白竜様の容態はどうですか？
MsgEn: How is The White Dragon's condition?

MsgJp:
白竜様が回復すれば何もかも
元どおりと聞いていますが――
MsgEn:
I hear that once The White Dragon recovers,
everything will be back to normal—

MsgJp:
ミシアルが現れたと聞いています
わたしも会いたかったですよ
MsgEn:
Mysial has appeared, I heard. I wanted to meet
her, too.

MsgJp:
わたしとメイリーフとでは
時間の感じ方も、心の動きの深さも
ぜんぜん違うのでしょうね
MsgEn:
I suppose Mayleaf and I experience time quite
differently, and the depth of our emotions varies
greatly.

MsgJp:
覚者さまでしたか
どうか、メイリーフにも一言お願いします
MsgEn:
Are you an Arisen? Please give a word to Mayleaf
as well.

MsgJp:
顔には出しませんが
メイリーフもひどく怯えているのです
あの《滅びの渦》について、です
MsgEn:
I won't show it on my face, but Mayleaf is also
terribly scared. It's about the 'Vortex of Ruin,'
you see.

MsgJp:
メイリーフはすでに“一族”を失っています
これ以上恐ろしい思いをさせたくはないのに――
MsgEn:
Mayleaf has already lost her 'family' and I don't
want to make her suffer anymore—

MsgJp:
任務の成功を
心よりお祈りしておりますわ
MsgEn: I wish you a successful mission.

MsgJp:
君に一番フィットするスタイルは――
あァ、悩ましい！
可能性が多すぎる！
MsgEn:
What style fits you the best— Ah, it's so
perplexing! There are too many possibilities!

MsgJp:
髪型からメイク、もっといろんなところまで
ボクの店では豊富なメニューを揃えてるよ
フフ、気になるかい――？
MsgEn:
From hairstyle to makeup, and even more, We have
a wide range of menus in my shop. Hehe, are you
interested—?

MsgJp:
人の好みは十人十色
きっと君にピッタリのスタイルがあるはずさ
MsgEn:
People have different preferences.
There must be a style that suits you perfectly!

MsgJp:
オーケイ！　素敵に変身したいのは誰だい？
容姿のスタイリングは<COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VAL PRICE_PARLOR_GP>を頂くよ
声やポーンの口調、発言頻度の変更はサービスさ！
好きにチェンジしていくといいよ
MsgEn:
Okay! Who wants a nice makeover?
I accept <COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VALPRICE_PARLOR_GP>.
We'll change your voice, pawn tone,
and frequency of speech as part of our service!
Change it up as you like!

MsgJp:
やぁ、来てくれて嬉しいよ
今日はどうなりたいか言ってごらん
ボクが素敵に変身させてあげるからさ――
MsgEn:
Hey, I'm glad you're here.
Tell me what you want to become today.
I'll transform you into something amazing...

MsgJp:
オーケイ！　素敵に変身したいのは誰だい？
容姿のスタイリングは<COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VAL PRICE_PARLOR_GP>を頂くよ
今なら<COL b92828><UNTN TK></COL> <VAL PRICE_PARLOR_TK>でも支払いＯＫだよ！
声やポーンの口調、発言頻度の変更はサービスさ！
好きにチェンジしていくといいよ
MsgEn:
Okay!　Who wants a makeover
for <COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VAL PRICE_PARLOR_GP>?
You can also pay using <COL b92828><UNTN TK></COL> <VAL PRICE_PARLOR_TK> now!
We'll change your voice, pawn tone,
and frequency of speech as part of our service!
Change it up as you like!

MsgJp:
おや？　君はメインポーンと契約してないみたいだ
まずはリムストーンを集めて
白竜さまのところへいかないとね
MsgEn:
Oh? It seems you haven't made a contract with a
main pawn yet. First, gather some Riftstone, and
then head to the White Dragon's place.

MsgJp:
一度契約したポーンを生まれ変わらせたいなら
その時はボクが全力でサポートするからさ
MsgEn:
If you want to transform the pawn you once
contracted with,
I will support you with all my might.

MsgJp:
さあ、生まれ変わりたいのは誰だい？
<COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VAL PRICE_REBORN_GP>を頂くけど
きっと満足させてみせるよ！
MsgEn:
Who wants to be born again?
I'll take <COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VAL PRICE_REBORN_GP>
but I'm sure I'll satisfy you!

MsgJp:
さあ、生まれ変わりたいのは誰だい？
ボクが全力でリボーンさせてあげよう――
お代は<COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VAL PRICE_REBORN_GP>を頂くよ
今なら<COL b92828><UNTN TK></COL> <VAL PRICE_REBORN_TK>でも支払いＯＫだよ！
MsgEn:
Now, who wants to be reborn?
I'll fully revitalize you and bring you into a new life—
The fee is <COL b92828><UNTN GS></COL> <VALPRICE_REBORN_GP>.
If you pay now, <COLb92828><UNTN TK></COL> <VAL PRICE_REBORN_TK>
is also acceptable!

MsgJp:
おや、<COL b92828>男性か女性専用のアイテム</COL>を
装備しているから、生まれ変わることはできないかな
専用の装備をはずして、またおいでよ
MsgEn:
Oh, I wonder if you can't be reborn because
you're equipped with <COL b92828>a male or female
exclusive item</COL>. Please take off the
exclusive equipment and come again.

MsgJp:
何か素材が要り用ですか？
一通りは取り揃えてますよ
MsgEn:
Do you need any materials? We have everything you
need.

MsgJp:
何か作るってんなら、素材がないと
話になりません
足りない物があれば見ていってください
MsgEn:
If you want to create something, it's not
possible without materials. If you're missing
something, take a look and see if I have it.

MsgJp:
通常の基本素材のほかに、素材同士を加工した
合成素材ってのもありましてね
まぁ、一手間かかってるわけです
MsgEn:
In addition to the basic materials, there are
also composite materials, which are processed from
other materials. Well, it takes a lot of time and
effort.

MsgJp:
素材の種類で言うと
インゴットなんかの《金属》、《布》や《糸》
なんかがそうですわ
MsgEn:
When it comes to the types of materials, ingots
and such are "metals," and things like "cloth" and
"thread" are included.

MsgJp:
ご存知で？
素材は採取で取れるほか、魔物を倒すことで
手に入るものもあるんですよ
MsgEn:
Do you know? Materials can be obtained by
gathering, and some can be obtained by defeating
monsters.

MsgJp:
どの辺りでどの素材がとれて、どんな敵が
出るかはテル村の覚者、アルフレドさんが
詳しいですよ
このハイデルでは
MsgEn:
In this area, Tel Village's Arisen, Mr. Alfred,
is very knowledgeable about where and what
materials can be obtained, as well as the types of
enemies that appear.

MsgJp:
いらっしゃいませ
どんな素材をお探しで？
MsgEn:
Welcome. What kind of materials are you looking
for?

MsgJp:
ランタン火種や癒しの薬は
多めに持っておくことをお勧めするぜ
MsgEn:
I recommend keeping extra Lantern Kindling and
Healing Potions for healing purposes.

MsgJp:
外へ出かけるなら準備を万全にな
備えあれば憂いなしってやつさ
採取道具の予備を忘れるなよ
MsgEn:
If you are going outside, make sure to make
thorough preparations. It's true that if you are
prepared, you will have nothing to worry about.
Don't forget to bring backup collection tools.

MsgJp:
最近はオークとの戦もごたついてるし
道具の需要も高くてな
流通が滞ったら大変だ
MsgEn:
Recently, there have been frequent battles with
Orcs, and the demand for tools is also high. If
the distribution is disrupted, it will be a big
problem.

MsgJp:
いらっしゃい
冒険の必需品なら当店で！
MsgEn:
Welcome! If you need adventure essentials, come
to our store!

MsgJp:
素材の中でも高値で取り引きされるのは
やっぱりデカイ魔物の牙や皮だな
MsgEn:
Among the materials, what is traded at a high
price is, after all, the fangs and skin of large
enemies.

MsgJp:
特に部位を狙って攻撃しないと
取れない素材が人気だよ
見つけたら即買いする人も多いしね
MsgEn:
Especially popular are materials that can only be
obtained by targeting specific parts. Many people
even buy them immediately when they find them.

MsgJp:
売りたい物や手に入れたい物があったら
気軽に相談してくださいよ！！
MsgEn:
If you have something you'd like to sell or get,
feel free to talk to me!

MsgJp:
いらっしゃい～！
掘り出し物は早い者勝ちだよ～！
MsgEn:
Welcome~!
The early bird gets the worm!

MsgJp: オーウェンのバザーにようこそ！
MsgEn: Welcome to Owen's Bazaar!

MsgJp:
お探しのものが出品されてると
いいですね
MsgEn:
It's good when the things you're looking for are
already being offered for sale.

MsgJp:
バザーは品物との出会いと別れの場
あなたにとって不要になった品も
必要とする人は必ずいますよ
MsgEn:
Bazaars are a place to meet and part with items.
Even if an item is no longer needed by you, there
is always someone who needs it!

MsgJp:
私はただの出会いの仲介者
ほんの少しの手数料をいただくだけ
MsgEn:
I am just a matchmaker for encounters, and I only
charge a small handling fee.

MsgJp:
いらっしゃいませ
本日の品揃えをご覧くださいな
MsgEn: Welcome! Please have a look at today's selection.

MsgJp:
寄ってらっしゃい見てらっしゃい！
思わぬお買い得品があるかもね
MsgEn:
Come by and have a look!
You might find a bargain you didn't expect!

MsgJp:
面白い品を手に入れたら
あたしの所に持ってきてね！
MsgEn:
When you obtain an interesting item, please bring
it to me!

MsgJp:
バザーなら、普通のお店じゃ
扱ってない品物だって手に入るんだから
MsgEn:
In a bazaar, you can even get items that regular
stores don't carry.

MsgJp:
こんにちは！
バザー品、見ていってね！
MsgEn:
Hello!
Please take a look at the bazaar items!

MsgJp:
道具の多くは、クラフトの
アイテム生産で作ることができる
ポーン持ちの覚者さんならな
すぐ手に入れたきゃ買ったほうが早いぞ
MsgEn:
Most of the tools can be crafted through the
production of crafts. If you're an Arisen with a
Pawn, it is faster to buy it if you want to get it
quickly.

MsgJp:
木材や鉱石の採取には、専用の道具が必要だ
なけりゃうちで揃えていきな
MsgEn:
To collect wood and ore, you need special tools.
If you don't have them, we'll get them for you.

MsgJp:
消耗品の予備には気をつけろよ
いざという時困るからな
MsgEn:
Be careful to keep spare consumables. You'll be
in trouble if you run out.

MsgJp:
いらっしゃい
各種薬にお守り、日用品も扱ってるぞ
MsgEn:
Welcome. We offer various medicines, talismans,
and everyday items as well.

MsgJp:
やぁ、君がいるクランの活躍は
聞いてるよ！
MsgEn:
Hey, I've heard about the success of the clan
you're in!

MsgJp:
さらに仲間との冒険が楽しくなるように
わたしからの贈り物だ
受け取っておくれ！
MsgEn:
To make your adventures with your friends even
more enjoyable, here is my gift to you. Please
accept it!

MsgJp:
《クラン》について聞きたけりゃ
何でも答えてあげよう
冒険がより華やかになること請け合いさ
MsgEn:
If you want to ask me about Clans,
I'll be happy to answer any questions you have.
I'm sure your adventures will be more colorful
than ever.

MsgJp:
同じ目的のもと、仲間と旅し共に歩む
うーん、素晴らしいじゃないか
MsgEn:
Within alchemy, there are techniques that apply
the logic of the craft as skills for battle. It is
the art of generating, transforming, and
rearranging substances by using one's own life
force as a medium.

MsgJp:
ここでは、《クラン》の設立・加入手続きや
入団の斡旋をしているよ
興味があるかい？
MsgEn:
Here, we handle the establishment and joining
procedures of Clans, and also facilitate the
matchmaking for new members. Are you interested?

MsgJp:
覚者さん、自身の情報は《覚者プロフィール》
でも確認できるんだよ
MsgEn:
Arisen, you can check your own information in the
"Arisen Profile".

MsgJp:
仲間のプロフィールを見せてもらうのも
面白いんじゃないかな
MsgEn:
It might be interesting to take a look at your
comrades' profiles.

MsgJp:
仲間の人となり、強さ、旅の記録なんかも
垣間見れるからね
MsgEn:
You'll get a glimpse of your friends'
personalities, their strength, and the record of
their journeys.

MsgJp:
《クラン酒場》へようこそ！
何かご用かな？
MsgEn:
Welcome to The Clan Tavern!
What can I do for you?

MsgJp:
そうそう、覚者さんにも伝えとかないと！
今回、《クラン》の仲間と使える
《クラン拠点》を手配したんだ
――なんて、もう知っていたかな？
MsgEn:
Yeah, that's right! I should tell you as well!
This time, I've arranged for a 《Clan Base》that you
can use with your 《Clan》 friends.
--Did you already know about it?

MsgJp:
覚者さんもぜひ使ってみておくれ
仲間だけでワイワイやるのも楽しそうだろ？
MsgEn:
Arisen, please give it a try as well. It seems
fun to do it together with friends, isn't it?

MsgJp:
《クラン酒場》へようこそ！
大変な時こそ、助け合う仲間が必要じゃないか？
MsgEn:
Welcome to the Clan Tavern! In times of trouble,
don't we all need friends to help each other out?

MsgJp:
《滅びの渦》に《黒剣》、《黒竜》ね――
この酒場にいるといろいろな噂を聞くが
これほどまでに“ただの噂”であってほしいと
願ったことはないよ
MsgEn:
In the "Vortex of Ruin," there is the "Black
Sword" and the "Black Dragon"... When you are in
this tavern, you hear various rumors, But I have
never wished for them to be more than "just
rumors."

MsgJp:
まいったな、悩み深き青少年じゃあるまいし
この年になって「明日が来るか」なんて
考えることになるとはね
MsgEn:
I'm at a loss, I'm not a deeply troubled youth.
It's surprising to start thinking about whether
"tomorrow will come" at this age.

MsgJp:
仲間と共にある喜びを
少しでも広められたなら――
MsgEn:
If even a little joy could be spread together
with comrades—

MsgJp:
いらっしゃーい！
海の見えるテラスでゆっくりしていってね
MsgEn:
Welcome! Please relax on the terrace with a view
of the sea.

MsgJp: 今日も稼ぐわよ～！
MsgEn: Today, I will get paid again~!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、お仕事頑張ってね！
いつでも待ってるわ
MsgEn:
Master Arisen, good luck with your work!
I'll always be waiting.

MsgJp: はぁい、あたしに何か用？
MsgEn: Yes, can I help you?

MsgJp:
いらっしゃーい！
さぁ、今日は何にする？
MsgEn:
Welcome!
What can I get for you today?

MsgJp:
この世が滅ぶ、なんて
あたしは信じないんだから！
MsgEn: There's no way this world could be destroyed!

MsgJp:
覚者さんたちも、騎士さんたちもいる
レスタニアは白竜さまの国なのよ！
大丈夫に決まってるわ！
MsgEn:
We have Arisen and Knights here in Lestania.
It is the land of the White Dragon!
Everything will be alright!

MsgJp:
都合の悪いものは
見ない主義なの、あたし
MsgEn:
It's my rule not to look at things that
inconvenience me.

MsgJp:
魔物の出現や事件は、この頃増える一方です
でも、めげないでください覚者さま！
応援してますから！
MsgEn:
The appearance of enemies and incidents are
increasing these days, but please do not be
discouraged, Ser Arisen! We are cheering for you!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、今度、冒険譚を聞かせて下さいね
MsgEn:
Arisen, please, tell us stories of your
adventures next time.

MsgJp:
今日も大陸のあちこちでは
いろいろな事が起こってるみたいですよ
MsgEn:
It seems like there's a lot going on all across
the land today!

MsgJp:
あら？　でも覚者さまはすでに他の
ミッションにエントリーされているみたいです
そちらを済ませるか、辞退されてから
あらためて申請してくださいね
MsgEn:
Oh? It seems you have already entered another
mission, Arisen.
Please either finish that one or decline and then
apply again.

MsgJp: 本日のニュースをお届けしますね！
MsgEn: I bring you today's news!

MsgJp:
あれから火球の話は届かないけど
もうそれどころじゃないよね
MsgEn:
Since then, I haven't heard any news about the
fireball, but that's not important anymore, is it?

MsgJp:
あとは覚者さんたちに任せて、わたしは
いつもの仕事に戻るね
MsgEn:
I'll leave the rest to the Arisen and go back to
my work, then.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、納品ありがとうございます！
まだまだ受け付けていますので
どんどん持ってきてくださいね
MsgEn:
Thank you for your delivery, Arisen!
Please keep bringing more and we will gladly
accept.

MsgJp:
えっ――
忘れちゃったんですね！
《白竜祭》の奉納期間中に持ってきてくださいね
MsgEn:
What--
You forgot it, didn't you?
Please bring it to me during the Dedication of
The White Dragon Festival.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、納品ありがとうございます！
みんなでレスタニアの豊穣を願う
《白竜祭》の奉納期間になりました
MsgEn:
Thank you for your delivery, Arisen!
We all wish for a bountiful harvest in Lestania.
It is time for the dedication of the 《White
Dragon Festival》!

MsgJp:
白竜さまにお納めする品物を
どんどん持ってきてくださいね
MsgEn:
Please keep bringing your items to present to the
White Dragon!

MsgJp: 見たい情報を選択してくださいね
MsgEn: Please select the desired information.

MsgJp: 個別納品報酬確認
MsgEn: Individual delivery rewards

MsgJp: ランキング報酬確認
MsgEn: Ranking Rewards

MsgJp:
本日のニュースは
えぇっと――《滅びの渦》以外の
ニュースがいいですよね？
MsgEn:
Today's news... umm, besides the "Vortex of
Stagnation," are there any other news that you'd
like to hear?

MsgJp:
みんな、今は《滅びの渦》のことしか
頭に無いみたいです
私も、ですけど――
MsgEn:
It seems everyone can think of nothing but the
Vortex of Stagnation right now.
I am too, but--

MsgJp:
覚者さまほどの方になると
ああいったものを見ても
怖くはないのですか？
MsgEn:
I suppose for someone like the Arisen, seeing
such a thing is no longer frightening.

MsgJp:
ううん、レスタニアには
白竜さまのご加護があるから
大丈夫――大丈夫です
MsgEn:
No, Lestania has the blessing of the White
Dragon, so don't worry--it'll be fine!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、その《クエストボード》にて
本日の任務、民の依頼をご確認ください
MsgEn:
Arisen, please check the《Quest Board》
for today's mission and the people's requests.

MsgJp:
達成すると、成果に応じた報酬が
依頼主より支払われますので
覚者さま自身の身支度に利用されるのも
良いかと思います
MsgEn:
Once achieved, a reward corresponding to the
results will be paid by the client, so it may also
be used for the Arisen's own devices.

MsgJp:
《クエストボード》で受けた納品依頼の
対応には、併設の《納品ボックス》を
ご利用ください
MsgEn:
Please use the "Delivery Box" located next to the
"Quest Board" to handle delivery requests.

MsgJp:
《クエストボード》は、地域ごとに管理され
現地で起こった問題や住民の依頼が
上がっています
MsgEn:
The Quest Board is managed by region, and it
displays issues that have occurred locally and
requests from residents.

MsgJp:
どうか、任地で民の助けとなってください
そうすることが、覚者さまの地域での
名声にもつながるでしょう
MsgEn:
Please, I implore you to assist the people in
your assigned area. This will surely contribute to
the fame of the Arisen in that region.

MsgJp:
お勤めご苦労さまでございます、覚者さま
本日もさまざまな依頼と任務が
《クエストボード》に寄せられております
MsgEn:
Thank you for your hard work, Ser Arisen. Today,
various requests and missions have been submitted
to the Quest Board.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、何なりと
MsgEn: Whatever you please, Arisen.

MsgJp:
ご存知です？
あのニュースの件
ほんと、心配ですわね
MsgEn:
Do you know?
That news incident...
I'm really worried, you know.

MsgJp:
噂というのはすぐに立つものですわ
そして、事件と共に移り変わるものですのよ
MsgEn:
Rumors are quick to start and change with the
events.

MsgJp:
覚者さま！　少し前、巨大な何かが
炎に包まれながら落下したそうなのです
MsgEn:
Ser Arisen! It seems that something enormous fell
while engulfed in flames, some time ago.

MsgJp:
たしか、南の村――テルの方でしたわ
巨大な流れ星が地面に落ちるのを
見た者もいるとか
MsgEn:
I'm certain it happened in the southern village,
Tel!
Some say they witnessed a massive shooting star
falling to the ground!

MsgJp:
もし調査に行かれるのでしたら
こっそり教えてくださらない？
私、口は堅いですわよ
MsgEn:
If you are going to conduct an investigation,
could you please quietly let me know?
I assure you, I can keep a secret.

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかがです？
MsgEn: How are you?

MsgJp:
《滅びの渦》について――
きっと、私よりも覚者さまの方が
お詳しいでしょうね
MsgEn:
About the Vortex of Stagnation--
I'm sure you know more about it than I do.

MsgJp:
砦の方はどうなっているのでしょう
実は、弟が砦に勤めているのです
呼び戻した方がよろしいのかしら
MsgEn:
I wonder how things are going at the fort.
Actually, my younger brother works there. I wonder
if it would be better to call him back.

MsgJp:
覚者の方々も、騎士団の方々も
顔色を変えて出てゆかれましたわ
ええ、私にも事の大きさはわかりますとも
MsgEn:
Both the Arisen and the knights had their faces
turn pale and left.
Yes, I understand the gravity of the situation as
well.

MsgJp:
レスタニアですらこの有様なのですから
小さな村の混乱は計り知れませんわね
MsgEn:
Even Lestania is in this mess.
The chaos in the small villages is immeasurable!

MsgJp:
なんだ？
神殿からの任務なら表の《クエストボード》
で発布されているだろう
MsgEn:
What is it?
If it's a mission from the temple, it would
surely be announced on the "Quest Board" outside.

MsgJp:
手助けはできないな
ハインツ副団長の許可がないからな
MsgEn:
I can't help you.
I don't have Vice Captain Heinz's permission.

MsgJp:
ここは白衛騎士団司令部だ
覚者が何か用か？
MsgEn:
This is the White Knight Commandery. What
business does the Arisen have here?

MsgJp:
２つ以上のミッションには
エントリーできないぞ
MsgEn: You can't enter more than one mission!

MsgJp:
先にエントリーしている方のミッションを
終わらせるか、エントリーを取り消して
再度こちらに戻るんだ
MsgEn:
Either finish the mission you've already entered,
or cancel your entry, then come back again.

MsgJp: 覚者が俺に何か用か？
MsgEn: Arisen, do you need anything from me?

MsgJp:
為すべき時に為すべき事を
俺のモットーだ
MsgEn:
My motto is to do what needs to be done when it
needs to be done

MsgJp: つまり――無駄話は好まない
MsgEn: In other words, I don't like idle chatter

MsgJp:
あんたに含むところは何もないが
覚者と話すといい具合にイライラしてな
俺の性分だと思って、気にしないでくれ
MsgEn:
I have nothing to include you in this, but
I get a good deal of frustration when I talk to
Arisen.
Guess it's just my nature, don't worry about it.

MsgJp:
ん？　もう報酬は受け取っただろう？
また次回の任務でな
MsgEn:
Hmm? You've already received your reward, haven't
you?
Another mission will be available next time.

MsgJp:
先の森の魔物討伐における報酬を
支給している
まだ受け取っていないなら
保管ボックスから受け取るといい
MsgEn:
Rewards for defeating the forest monsters have
been paid to
If you haven't received them yet, you can receive
them from the storage box at

MsgJp:
先の戦闘の評価でお前の活躍は相当のものだった
追加報酬として
シークレットアビリティが送られることになった
これがその報酬だ
MsgEn:
Your performance in the evaluation of the last
battle was considerable
As an additional reward
you will be sent a Secret Ability
Here's the reward

MsgJp:
解決してもすぐまた次の問題が湧いて出る
困ったものだ
MsgEn:
Even if you solve it, another problem immediately
emerges.
Troublesome indeed.

MsgJp:
――それにしても
少し前から《古の祭祀場》での魔物報告が
相次いでいる
MsgEn:
――However, there have been frequent reports of
enemies at the Ancient Place of Rituals since a
while ago.

MsgJp:
竜力が淀みやすい場所だとは聞いていたが
こうも続くとは――
お互い気が抜けんな
MsgEn:
I've heard it's a place where dragon power tends
to stagnate.
I didn't think it would last this long--
We can't let up on each other.

MsgJp:
あまり話しかけてくれるなよ？
団には覚者を良く思わない者が多いからな
MsgEn:
Don't talk to me too much, okay?
There are a lot of people in the group who don't
take kindly to Arisen people.

MsgJp:
夜や雨天は、普段とは違う魔物が現れる
ま、外に出る時は天候も気をつけることだ
MsgEn:
At night and in the rain, unusual demons appear.
Well, when you go outside, be aware of the
weather too!

MsgJp:
エントリーは歓迎するが、お前は先になすべき
ミッションがあるみたいだな
そちらを終わらせるか、取り消してから
あらためて顔を出してくれ
MsgEn:
You're welcome to enter, but it looks like you
have a mission to do first
finish that one or cancel it and then
show up again.

MsgJp:
さきほど入った《古の祭祀場》最新情報に
よれば魔物は今姿を晦ましているようだ
出現情報が入り次第、エントリー受付を再開する
MsgEn:
According to the latest information from the
Ancient Place of Rituals, the enemies seem to
have disappeared
. We will reopen the entry reception as soon as
we receive information about their appearance

MsgJp:
どうにか《古の祭祀場》の件は事なきを得た
――お前への報酬は今回出ていないが
エントの確認など、協力の噂は聞いていたぞ
次は力を借りることになりそうだな
MsgEn:
Somehow we managed to get the "Ancient Ritual
Hall" thing off the ground.
--No reward for you this time, but
I've heard rumors of cooperation, including
confirmation of the Ent.
I guess I'll be asking for your help next time.

MsgJp: ん、どうした？
MsgEn: Hm, what is it?

MsgJp:
ふん――
レオが姿を消したと聞いてどうなることかと
思っていたが――
MsgEn:
Hmm--
I was wondering what would happen when I heard
Leo had disappeared
but--

MsgJp: せいぜい、仲良くしようではないか
MsgEn: Let's just get along, okay?

MsgJp:
覚者になりたいと思うこともあったが
おまえを見ていてわかったよ
MsgEn:
There were times I wanted to be a Arisen, but I
knew it when I saw
you.

MsgJp:
集団の力を信じ、その一部であることに
喜びを感じるわたしは
覚者には向いていないようだ
MsgEn:
I believe in the power of the collective and take
pleasure in being part of it, but I don't think
I'm cut out to be an Arisen.

MsgJp:
ゲルト騎士団長は義に厚く寛大な御方だ
我々は白竜様とあの方に仕えることに
誇りを感じている
MsgEn:
Commander Gerd is a righteous and generous man.
We are proud
to serve the White Dragon and him.

MsgJp:
白竜様の加護があるのは
お前達だけではないぞ、覚者
MsgEn:
You are not the only ones who have the blessing
of the White Dragon, Arisen.

MsgJp:
まったく、ジョゼフ神官は騎士団ではなく
なぜいつも覚者隊ばかり――
MsgEn:
Not at all, Priest Joseph is not a knight
Why is it always the Arisen corps--?

MsgJp:
覚者隊の者か
なにか用か
MsgEn:
You're from the Sentinel Corps?
Can I help you?

MsgJp:
白竜神殿は我々白衛騎士団が
全力を持ってお守りする
竜の盾たる我々がな
MsgEn:
The White Dragon Temple will be protected by us,
the Knights of the White Guard,
with all our might.
We are the shield of the dragon.

MsgJp:
この神殿は、白竜様に仕える者が集い
守り続けてきた由緒ある尊い場所
MsgEn:
This temple is a venerable and precious place
where the servants of the White Dragon have
gathered and
protected.

MsgJp:
我々白騎団、お前たち覚者隊
双方にとってそれは変わらん
MsgEn:
We the White Knights, you the Arisen Corps,
that doesn't change for either side.

MsgJp: 特に異常はない
MsgEn: There is nothing unusual in particular.

MsgJp:
何やら空から光の玉が降ってきたと
いうじゃないか
MsgEn:
You say
that some kind of ball of light fell from the sky.

MsgJp:
つい最近のオーク共の攻撃といい
面倒なことが続くな
MsgEn:
Just recently, the orcs attacked
and things keep getting messy.

MsgJp:
覚者隊からも見張りの担当を
立てて貰いたいものだ
MsgEn:
I'd like the Arisen Corps appoint someone in
charge of the watch.

MsgJp: 聞きたい事でもあるのか？
MsgEn: Is there something you want to ask?

MsgJp:
おお！！　黄金竜討伐の重要任務
お疲れ様でございます！
保管ボックスに報酬が納められております
どうぞお受け取りを！
MsgEn:
Oh! Thank you for your hard work on the important
mission to defeat the Golden Dragon
The reward has been delivered to your storage box.
Please accept it!

MsgJp:
そういえば！
覚者殿に、黄金竜討伐任務の戦果に対して
特別報酬が出ております！
MsgEn:
By the way!
Ser Arisen, for your achievements in the Golden
Dragon defeat mission
special rewards have been prepared!

MsgJp:
こちらがその、秘伝のアビリティだそうです！
どうぞお受け取りを！
MsgEn:
Here is the secret ability!
Please receive it!

MsgJp:
今回の任務、お疲れ様でございます！
報酬はもうお受け取りになられた
ようですね。次回もぜひ――！
MsgEn:
Thank you for your efforts in this mission!
It seems you have already received the rewards.
Please do your best next time!

MsgJp: 自分、どんな任務でも頑張ります！
MsgEn: I will do my best no matter what task it might be!

MsgJp: 神殿と白竜様のためなら命を賭ける覚悟です！
MsgEn:
I am prepared to risk my life for the temple and
the White Dragon-sama!

MsgJp: 自分はこの《謎の礎》の守番なのです
MsgEn: I am the guardian of this Mysterious Keystone.

MsgJp:
これは、神殿がこの地にできる前からすでに
あったものだと言われておりますが
正確なところは分かっておりません
MsgEn:
It is said that this was already
in existence before the temple was built here, but
we do not know exactly what it is!

MsgJp:
ただ、必ず白騎団か覚者隊のものが
目を離さず番をしておかなければならぬと
言われているそうです
MsgEn:
However, it is said that the White Knights or the
Arisen Corps must
keep an eye on

MsgJp:
覚者殿、しかしあなたはどうやら他の
重要ミッションを受けておられるようです
現在参加予定のミッションを終了するか
辞退された方がよろしいかと――
MsgEn:
Dear Arisen, but it seems you are on another
important mission
and you may want to finish or decline the mission
you are currently on--

MsgJp:
覚者殿、現在入っている情報によりますと
かの黄金竜は礎の先から姿を消している様子
次の討伐隊派遣まで、もうしばらくお待ちください
MsgEn:
Arisen, according to the current information
available
, it seems that the Golden Dragon has disappeared
from the foundation. Please wait a little longer
until the next dispatch of the extermination team
.

MsgJp:
ああ、覚者さま！
なんとか此度の危機を乗り切ったようです
――聞くところによると、大戦果をおさめた方は
かなりの報酬がでるとか。ぜひ覚者殿も、次回は！
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen!
It seems that you managed to overcome this danger.
-- I hear that great rewards await those who
achieve great success in battle.
Best of luck next time, Arisen!

MsgJp: ハイ、自分に用ですか
MsgEn: Yes, do you need me for something?

MsgJp:
覚者さま、仲間と旅をする上で
最も重要なこと――
それは、協力そして意思疎通
MsgEn:
Dear Arisen, the most important thing to do when
traveling with your fellow
travelers--
is to cooperate and communicate with each other!

MsgJp:
それには、《チャット》そして《エモート》
という二つの大きな手段がございます
MsgEn:
For that, there are two major means: "Chat" and
"Emote"

MsgJp:
言葉を介する、《チャット》は
欠かせぬコミュニケーション手段です
声かけによってのみなし得る協力もありましょう
MsgEn:
Chat is an indispensable means of communication
that involves words.
Cooperation can only be achieved by talking to
each other.

MsgJp:
《エモート》は、相手と言葉を越え解り合い
絆を育む良き手段
使うことで親睦も深まりましょう
MsgEn:
"Emote" is a good means to understand and bond
with others beyond words. Using it can deepen
friendly relationships.

MsgJp:
この神殿は多くの騎士様、そして
あなたがた覚者様によって支えられています
白竜様のご加護がありますように
MsgEn:
This temple is supported by many knights and
you Arisen ones.
May the White Dragon bless you!

MsgJp:
言葉を伝える《チャット》と
身振りで伝える《エモート》――
この二つをお忘れなきよう
MsgEn:
Don't forget the "Chat" to communicate with words
and
the "Emote" to communicate with gestures--

MsgJp: 覚者さま、何かご用でしょうか
MsgEn: Master Arisen, do you have any business with me?

MsgJp:
レスタニアニュース以外にも
日々の小さな事件は《クエストボード》に
多く寄せられておりますぞ

《レスタニアニュース》は
読んで頂いておりますかな？
私が集めた情報の粋を！
MsgEn:
Are you reading "Lestania News"? It has the best
of the information I have gathered!

MsgJp:
いやぁ、こうして覚者さまの役に
立てることが私の生き甲斐でしてね！
ペンで剣を動かすなんて――おっと失礼！
MsgEn:
Well, being of service to you in this way
is what makes my life worth living!
I can't believe I'm using a pen to move a
sword...oops, excuse me!

MsgJp: おお、これは覚者さま！
MsgEn: Oh, it's the Arisen!

MsgJp:
これは覚者さま！
一大事ですな、ほら――《滅びの渦》です
MsgEn:
It's the Arisen!
This is terrible, look--it's the "Vortex of
Stagnation".

MsgJp:
《滅びの渦》の真下には
《黒剣》というものが突き刺さっていて
大地から竜力を吸い上げているのだとか――
MsgEn:
Below the "Vortex of Stagnation," there is said
to be a "Black Sword" piercing through it, drawing
in Dragon Force from the Earth.

MsgJp:
我々一般人には、詳細が知らされておりません
目にした天変地異に怯えるばかりなのですよ
そこで、少しでも不安を軽減できればと――

しかし、こんな情報を伝えたところで
より不安になることは目に見えていますからな
結局、記事にはしていないのです

覚者さまのご活躍を
また記事にできる日を楽しみにしておりますぞ！
MsgEn:
I look forward to the day when I can write an
article about the Arisen's heroic deeds!

MsgJp: いい男、どっかにいないかな～
MsgEn: I hope I can find a good man somewhere~

MsgJp:
逞しくってワイルドな戦士もいいけど
知的で紳士な術士もいいわよね
悩むなぁ～
MsgEn:
I like a strong and tough soldier, but a smart
and gentlemanly magician is also nice, right? I
can't decide~

MsgJp:
うーん
でもやっぱり、お金持ちがいいかしら
MsgEn:
Hmmm
but I still think I'd rather be rich.

MsgJp: うふふ、あらなぁに？
MsgEn: Ufufu, oh my~

It will be <VAL PRICE_INN> for a one-night stay.
You will be completely refreshed!
Would you like to stay?

MsgEn: No

おお、《弱化の治療》ですかな、では
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>ほど必要となりますが
よろしいですかな？
MsgEn:
Ah, "Cure for Weakness"?
That will be <VAL PRICE_WEAK>.
What do you say?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
おや、《弱化》には掛っていないようですぞ
治療の必要はないようですな
MsgEn:
Well, it doesn't seem to be "weakened"
and doesn't seem to need any treatment.

MsgJp:
長旅前にはゆっくりお休みを取り
万全の状態になされませ
MsgEn:
Please take a good night's rest before your long
trip to
and make sure you are in good shape.

MsgJp:
体調不安は旅に響きますぞ
覚者さまとて人間、無理はなさいますな
MsgEn:
If you are worried about your health, it will
affect your trip.
Even the Master of the Learned is a human being,
so don't overdo it.

MsgJp:
ようこそおいでくださいました
お部屋のご用意はすぐにできますぞ
MsgEn:
Welcome to
We'll have your room ready for you in no time!

MsgJp:
おお、これはこれは覚者さま
ジョゼフ神官から事情は聞いておりますぞ
ささ、我が家と思いご自由にお休み下され
MsgEn:
Oh, well, well, well, my learned friend,
I've heard what's going on from Priest Joseph
Please, feel free to make yourself at home and
rest.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
旅先で疲れがたまると、回復魔法だけでは
疲労は取り切れなくなりますぞ
MsgEn:
If you're tired from your travels, restorative
magic alone won't
take the fatigue away!

MsgJp:
薬でも疲れはとれますが、やはり本調子に
戻るには快眠がいちばんでしょうな
MsgEn:
Medication can relieve fatigue, but I think a
good night's sleep is the best way to get back on
track

ジュリアのことですか

Is it about Julia?

inn
So she asked if she could show the 'Arisen' to
her room
She got so excited and-

ご迷惑をおかけしていないでしょうか？
良い子なのですが、たまに一生懸命に

MsgEn:
I hope we're not causing any trouble.
She's a good girl, but sometimes she tries too
hard
-

MsgEn: If you're tired, please rest at our inn

MsgJp:
パーティーメンバーの方の部屋を
ご訪問されるのでしたら
手配をお手伝いいたしましょう
MsgEn:
If you are going to
visit the room of the party member
I will help you make arrangements

MsgJp:
パーティーメンバーの参加を待ちましょう
お相手のあることですから
少々時間がかかるかもしれませんな
MsgEn:
We'll wait for the party members to join
and then we'll have a partner
It might take a little while.

MsgJp: パーティーリーダーの部屋に行かれるのですかな？
MsgEn: Are you going to the party leader's room?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
パーティーリーダーが
部屋への訪問を募集していないようです
――勝手に上がりこむわけにはゆきませんからな
MsgEn:
It appears that the party leader is not inviting
visitors to the
room
--I'm not going to just barge in on my own!

MsgJp:
おや、覚者さま
パーティーメンバーの部屋を訪問するには
まずパーティーを組まねばなりません
でないと、ご案内できませんからな――
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen!
You must first form a party to visit a party
member's room, or we can't show you there--!

MsgJp:
――これは失礼いたしました
覚者さまにはまだ《自室》を

MsgEn:
――Oh, I do apologize. It seems I have not yet

MsgJp:
そこにおります娘のジュリアが
覚者さまを《自室》へとご案内いたします

MsgEn: There is my daughter Julia will guide the Arisen to your own room 2 It would be good to take a break in your own room first

MsgEn:
Currently, we have publicly announced

MsgEn: Do not change

Yeah, so let's leave it at

MsgJp: どちらのお部屋に行かれますかな？
MsgEn: Which room would you like to go to?

MsgJp:
おお、覚者さま
みなまではお聞きしませぬ
お部屋の準備は整っております
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen,
we will not hear from you until
your room is ready!

MsgJp:
覚者の統率でいる重圧もあることでしょう
体調に響かぬよう、休息もお取りください
MsgEn:
I'm sure you are under a lot of pressure being
the leader of the Arisen.
Please take some rest and don't let it affect
your health!

MsgJp:
あの禍々しい《滅びの渦》――
あんなものを作りだす敵に
果たして人の身で敵うものでしょうか
MsgEn:
That horrific "vortex of destruction"--
I wonder if a human body can really compete with
an enemy that can create something like that.

MsgJp:
十分にお休みいただくほか
何もできないのが歯がゆくもありますな
MsgEn:
I hope you have a good night's rest.
I'm sorry I can't do anything for you.

MsgJp:
魔物討伐の報酬はすでに支給されたはずだ
私の記憶はたしかだ
MsgEn:
I believe the reward for defeating the demons has
already been paid.
I remember it well.

MsgJp:
覚者よ、魔物討伐の報酬が支給されたそうだ
保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
Arisen, the reward for defeating the demons has
been paid to you.
Please accept it from the storage box.

MsgJp:
もうひとつ言付かっている、覚者よ
かの魔物撃退への貢献が認められ
“すごいアビリティ”がもらえるそうだ
これがどうやらそうらしい――受け取れ
MsgEn:
There is one more thing I must tell you, Arisen.
In recognition of your contribution to the defeat
of that enemy, you will receive an "amazing
ability".
It seems that is what this is - take it!

MsgJp:
私はファビオ様のもの
他の者の命令は受け付けない
MsgEn:
My master is Fabio.
I do not accept orders from anyone else.

MsgJp:
知らない覚者についていくなと
厳しく言いつけられている
MsgEn: I have strict orders not to follow another Arisen.

MsgJp:
商店区の店ではなく、ファビオ様との
アイテム取り引きを強く勧める
MsgEn:
I strongly recommend doing business with Fabio
rather than visiting the stores in the shopping
district.

MsgJp:
――呼び込み？　と言われていたか
とにかく、ここで覚者たちにそう伝えるよう
私は言いつかっている
MsgEn:
Did you say they were calling for me?
Anyway, I have been told to convey this message
to the Arisen here.

MsgJp:
私の魅力ならできる、との事だ
よろしく頼む
MsgEn:
I can do it with my charm, that's what they said
I'm counting on you

MsgJp:
主は私によく問われる
ポーンとは、人か、それとも物か？
私には答えられぬ問いだ
MsgEn:
The Master often asks me
What are Pawns, are they people or things?
It's a question I cannot answer

MsgJp:
――ああ、だが覚者よ
すでに別のミッションを引き受けたようだな
ならそちらを済ますか、辞退するのが筋だろう
その後、あらためて参加を頼みたい
MsgEn:
――Ah, but Arisen.
It seems you have already taken on another
mission.
In that case, it would be appropriate to decline
and finish that one instead.
Afterwards, I would like to request your
participation once again.

MsgJp:
――その件なのだが、かの魔物は
現在どうやら姿を消しているらしい
目撃情報が入り次第、討伐隊の再募集を
予定している
MsgEn:
-For that matter however, it seems that the enemy
has currently disappeared.
As soon as there are any eyewitness reports, we
plan to recruit an expeditionary force.

MsgJp:
どうやら、かの魔物を退散せしめたようだ
――覚者よ。あなた宛の報酬は預かっていないが
機会がくれば、ぜひ助力を
MsgEn:
It seems that the enemy has been driven away
――Arisen. Although I have not received your reward
If the opportunity arises, please provide
assistance

MsgJp: 覚者よ、私に何か？
MsgEn: Arisen, do you need anything from me?

MsgJp:
覚者さま、そういえばこのようなお話を
ご存知でしょうか？
《良質の装備品》、《珍しいアイテム》を持つ
魔物についてでございます
MsgEn:
By the way, Arisen, have you ever heard such a
story as this?
It tells of an enemy with "good equipment" and
"rare items".

MsgJp:
エリアマスターの覚者アルフレドさまから
お聞きしたのですが、それぞれの地域には
《魔物警戒スポット》なる場所があるそうです
MsgEn:
I heard from the Area Master, Master Alfredo that
there are "Demon Alert Spots" in each area!

MsgJp:
そういったスポットに巣くう魔物は多くの
覚者と戦い、時として遺物かもしれぬ
装備やアイテムを落とすのだとか
MsgEn:
The demons that lurk in such spots fight with many
learners and sometimes drop equipment or items
that may be relics

MsgJp:
危険は大きいかもしれませんが
クラフトや購入以外で覚者さまの装備調達
手段となるかもしれません
MsgEn:
The danger may be great, but it may be a way to
acquire equipment for the Arisen other than by
crafting or purchasing.

MsgJp:
詳しくは、各地のエリアマスターを
お訪ねくださいませ
そういった場所の多くは、エリアに
関わる中で明らかになるそうですよ

必要な素材のいくらかは、クラフトルーム
にも備えております
奥にいるギリアムとマコーミックにご相談ください
MsgEn:
Some of the materials you will need are also
stocked in the Craft Room.
Please ask Gilliam and McCormick in the back.

MsgJp:
アイテム、武器防具、そしてジュエリー
あなたと共にある品を、私たちポーンが
製作致しましょう
MsgEn:
Let us, the Pawn, create items, weapons, armor,
and jewelry for you
, that you have

MsgJp:
いかなる品の製作をお望みでしょう？
望みを仰ってください、覚者さま
MsgEn:
What kind of item would you like us to craft?
Please tell us your wishes, Arisen-sama

MsgJp:
ようこそ覚者さま
――あら、あなたさまはまだポーンとの契約を
交わしておられないようですね
MsgEn:
Welcome, Arisen-sama
―― Oh, it seems that you have not yet formed a
contract with a Pawn

MsgJp:
クラフトの技はポーンの技
あなたさまがご自身のポーンをお持ちに
なられた時、再びお訪ねください
MsgEn:
The skill of crafting lies within the Pawn
. When you acquire your own Pawn
, please visit us again

MsgJp:
ようこそ覚者さま
創造と精錬の場、《クラフトルーム》へ
なんなりとご用命を
MsgEn:
Welcome, Ser Arisen
to the place of creation and refinement, the
Craft Room
Please feel free to make any requests

MsgJp:
今回の砦防衛の報酬はどうだった？
次もぜひ力を貸してくれ！
MsgEn:
How was the reward for defending the fort this
time?
Please lend your strength again next time!

MsgJp:
グリッテン砦防衛の功績に対し報酬が出ているぞ
保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
A reward is available for your achievements in
defending Fort Gritten
Please collect from the storage box

MsgJp:
こたびの協力に感謝する
戦果を称え、特別なアビリティが
送られることになったぞ
さぁ、受け取ってくれ！
MsgEn:
Thank you for your cooperation.
In honor of your success, a special ability will
be
sent to you.
Please take it!

MsgJp:
ヴァネッサ副隊長は美しいだけではないぞ！
あの人は類まれなる剣の使い手でもある
MsgEn:
Vice Captain Vanessa is not only beautiful!
She's also an exceptional swordswoman.

MsgJp:
剣の腕を磨きたければ、それなりの
武功を示して弟子入り志願するんだな
MsgEn:
If you want to improve your swordsmanship, you'll
have to show a certain
amount of military merit and volunteer to be an
apprentice.

MsgJp:
参加表明は嬉しいが、どうやらお前は
すでに他のミッションへの参加予定があるようだ
先にそちらを達成するか、取り消し連絡を
してからあらためて来てくれ
MsgEn:
Glad to hear you're in, but it looks like you
already have plans to participate in
another mission:
accomplish that one first, or contact
to cancel, and come back later.

MsgJp:
俺はグリッテン砦の連絡員だ
砦で緊急事態が起こった時は
俺から連絡する
MsgEn:
I'm the liaison at Fort Gritten.
If there's an emergency at the fort,
I'll call you.

MsgJp:
ヴァネッサ副隊長は本当に
人遣いが荒くてなぁ
だが、ふふふ、それがいい！
MsgEn:
Vice Captain Vanessa is really
rough on people.
But, hmmm, that's good!

MsgJp:
オークどもめ、性懲りもなく
砦を攻めようとは
しかも奴らは臭くてかなわんしなぁ
MsgEn:
Orcs, you never learn
to attack a fort
and they stink too much!

MsgJp:
今回のグリッテン砦防衛戦は終了した
――ん？　お前あてに預かっている報酬はないようだ
ぜひまた力を貸してくれ！
MsgEn:
This defense of Fort Gritten is over.
-- Hmm? There seems to be no reward entrusted to
you.
Please lend me your help again!

MsgJp: よう、俺に何か用か？
MsgEn: Lord, do you have any business with me?

MsgJp: よう、大変なことになったな
MsgEn: Lord, it has become quite a situation.

MsgJp:
大人しく滅びを待つつもりはない
もとより白竜さまに捧げた命だ
惜しいとは思わん
MsgEn:
I have no intention of waiting to perish meekly.
I originally dedicated my life to the White
Dragon.
I don't think it's too much to ask.

MsgJp: お前の部下たちの様子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How are your subordinates doing?

MsgJp:
それにしても、お前も大きくなったよなぁ
ひよっこの頃から見てきてるんだ
感慨深くもなる
MsgEn:
But still, you've grown up too.
I've been watching you since you were a chick.
I'm deeply moved.

MsgJp:
世の中には、それぞれの道を究めた
職の達人たちがいるらしい
MsgEn:
It seems that there are
masters of their craft who have mastered their
respective paths in the world.

MsgJp:
そういった達人は《ジョブマスター》と呼ばれ
一般的に使われる戦技以上の技を
使いこなすという
MsgEn:
Those experts are called "job masters".
They are skilled in techniques above and beyond
the standard battle techniques.

MsgJp:
もっとも、まずは基礎からだ
中級の技を軽々と扱えるほどにならなければ
縁のない話だぞ
MsgEn:
Of course, the basics come first.
If you do not become comfortable with the
intermediate techniques
you will get nowhere.

MsgJp:
そうだな、彼らに技を習うのであれば
レベル18が目安といったところだ
MsgEn:
Yes, if you want to learn skills from them,
I'd say you should be level 18.

MsgJp:
魔物にはそれぞれ弱点があり
適した技やチャンスがある
敵と己を知れば、百戦あやうからずだ！
MsgEn:
Monsters each have their own weaknesses,
so use suitable skills and don't miss
opportunities.
If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need
not fear the result of a hundred battles!

MsgJp:
魔物に対抗する技を磨くのは
騎士団も覚者も同じ
つまらん諍いは俺には関係ないな
MsgEn:
It's the same for both the knights and the Arisen
to hone their skills against demons.
Boring quarrels are none of my business.

MsgJp:
鍛えているか？
自身の技と経験こそ、何よりの武器だぞ
MsgEn:
Do you train?
Your own skill and experience are your best
weapons.

MsgJp:
おお、覚者よ
戦技の習得か、それとも職変えか
用件を聞こう
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen,
learning the art of war or changing careers
let's hear what you have to say.

MsgJp:
おお、覚者よ
状況が状況だ――戦技にしろ、職にしろ
万全の状態にしておくことだ
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen,
the situation is the situation--whether it's a
war skill or a job
make sure you're in top shape!

MsgJp:
恐れる必要はない
今まで鍛えてきた成果を発揮する時だと
大きく構えることだ
MsgEn:
Don't be afraid
it's time to show what you've been working out
and take a big stand!

MsgJp:
萎縮しては技も鈍ろう
これまでの経験がお前の何よりの武器だ
MsgEn:
Atrophy will dull your skills.
Your experience so far is your best weapon.

MsgJp:
覚者や騎士、一部の神殿関係者以外には
まだ詳しいことは知らされていない
混乱を招きかねないというジョゼフ神官の判断だ
MsgEn:
No one other than Arisen, knights, and
some temple officials

Priest Joseph's decision that it could be

Oh, I see. If you plan on traveling with strong

それとも、無意識に頼って手を抜いちまう
のかなぁ
MsgEn:
I wonder if veterans gain more experience in

俺の体験から言うと
MsgEn:
It doesn't seem to stick as much as I thought
based on my own experience

いやぁ、俺も騎士団入りたてでさ

ほんとかなぁ
MsgEn:
Well, I just joined the Knight Order

teach others

初めての武器で扱い慣れてないと

MsgEn:
I can't deal with monsters
if I'm not used to handling my first weapon

Whether it's today, tomorrow, or another day, the

!

You will find a variety of rare items and

MsgEn:
Dear savant
Looking for materials for your craft?

MsgJp:
出品物の値段や在庫は日によって違います
定期的なチェックをお勧めしますよ！
MsgEn:
Prices and availability of items on display vary
from day to day.
We recommend you check back regularly!

MsgJp:
クラフトで余分に布やインゴットを作ってしまった
そんな場合、私の方でも引きとらせて
いただきますので！
MsgEn:
If you have made extra cloth or ingots from crafts
in such cases, I will be happy to take them back
!

MsgJp:
不要になったり余った素材がありましたら
ぜひバザーをご利用ください！
MsgEn:
If you have any materials that you no longer need
or have left over, please visit
and use the bazaar!

MsgEn:
In the "Craft Room," while the Arisen is away on

MsgEn: Welcome, Ser Arisen.

MsgJp:
覚者よ！
今回の取り分はすでに受け取ったようだな！
次はさらに上を目指し、存分に暴れるがいい！
がははははは！！
MsgEn:
Arisen!
You've already received your share this time!
Next time, aim even higher, and go wild to your
heart's content!
Ha-ha-ha-ha!

MsgJp:
ああ、今回の取り分は送っておいたぞ！
保管ボックスを確認するといい
次の出航が今から楽しみだ！
なぁ、覚者よ、そうだろう！？
MsgEn:
Ah, I've sent you this time's reward!
You should check the storage box.
I'm really looking forward to the next voyage!
Right, my Lord, isn't that right?!

MsgJp:
おお！　丁度、戦果の集計がついたところだ
勇敢なる覚者よ、その戦果を評して
秘蔵のアビリティを送ろうではないか！
胸を張って受け取るがいい！
MsgEn:
Oh!　We have just tallied the results of the war.
In recognition of your war achievements, valiant
Arisens, we send you
a treasured ability!
Receive it with pride!

MsgJp:
ふーむ、覚者よ
血気盛んなのは結構だが、他にエントリー中の
任務があるようだな
先にそちらにケリをつけてくるがいい！
MsgEn:
Hmmm, Arisen,
I appreciate your bloodlust, but I see you have
another
mission you're entering
You can go finish that one first!

MsgJp:
おお――、勇敢なる覚者よ
すまないが前回の出撃で現在洋撃船は修理中だ
準備が整うまで、今しばらく待っていてくれ！
MsgEn:
Oh--, brave Arisen.
Sorry, but the Western blaster is currently being
repaired after the last sortie.
Please wait a while now until it's ready!

MsgJp:
がはははは！　船はまだ準備中だ
そう急くな！
MsgEn:
Hahaha! The ship is still being prepared
. Don't rush!

MsgJp:
沖合に浮かぶ孤島、《竜の巣》
別名、魔物のるつぼ
MsgEn:
The isolated island floating offshore, known as
"Dragon's Nest"
. Also known as The Crucible of Demons

MsgJp:
竜が死に、生まれいづる場所というが
本当の所は解らん
MsgEn:
It is said to be the place where dragons die and
are born, but no one knows for certain.

MsgJp: なぁ、ロマンだろう？
MsgEn: Isn't it romantic, eh?

MsgJp:
海流が激しくなり、ヒュージブルが現れ
外洋調査はここ300年できない状態だ
MsgEn:
The currents have intensified, the fusibles have
appeared
and open ocean research hasn't been possible for
the last 300 years.

MsgJp:
だが、海の先にはさらに広大な
世界が広がっているように思わんか？
ロマンだろう！
MsgEn:
But doesn't it seem like there is an even more
vast
world beyond the sea?
Romantic, isn't it?

MsgJp:
おお、覚者よ！
今回の《竜の巣》調査は終了したぞ
あいにく今渡せる報酬はないが、機会など
またすぐ巡ってこよう。がははは！
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen!
This "Dragon's Nest" survey is over.
Unfortunately, I don't have a reward to give you
now, but I will give you another chance
soon. I'll be back soon!

MsgJp:
《竜の巣》はただの魔物の巣だと考える
者もいるが、それだけとは思えんなぁ
MsgEn:
Some people consider the "Dragon's Nest" to be
just an enemy nest, but I don't think it's that
simple.

MsgJp:
エルダードラゴンや、さらに巨大な竜の化石も
古い岩盤には残っているというではないか
MsgEn:
Elder Dragons and even the fossils of gigantic
dragons
are said to remain in the ancient bedrock

MsgJp:
レスタニアの大地の他、船で辿りつけるのは
つねに小さな孤島のみ
他にも大陸はあるのか、否か――謎だなぁ！
MsgEn:
Other than the land of Lestania, you can only
reach it by ship
There are always only small islands
I wonder if there are other continents or
not—it's a mystery!

MsgJp:
あまりに身近で忘れてるかもしれんが
《竜の礎》や《リムストーン》なんかも
いつ誰が造ったものかは分かっていないだろう
MsgEn:
Arisen are too familiar with the
Dragon's Keystone and
Rift Crystal. I wonder if you have forgotten who
made them.

MsgJp:
がははは！　分からんことだらけだがともあれ
《竜の巣》探査が外洋遠征任務の
要ということだ！
MsgEn:
Ha-ha-ha! I don't know a lot of things, but at
any rate,
the exploration of the "Dragon's Lair" is the
cornerstone of the open-sea expedition mission!

MsgJp:
おお、よく来たな
勇敢なる覚者よ！
MsgEn:
Oh, you have come
brave Arisen!

MsgJp:
どんな状況だろうと船は出してやる
あんたらの気持ち次第さ
MsgEn:
No matter what the situation is, I will send you
off
depending on your feelings.

MsgJp:
よう、冒険者たち
調子はどうだ？
MsgEn:
Greetings, adventurers
How are you doing?
